definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: (dialectic variation of [[כַּעַם]], only in Jb);—´[[כ]] Job 17:7, [[כָָּעָשׂ]] Job 5:2; sf. [[כַּעְשִׂי]] Job 6:2; [[כַּעַשְְׂ]] Job 10:17; —
vexation, grief of men Job 5:2 (cf. Pr 12:16, Pr 27:3), Job 6:2, Job 17:7.
vexation, anger, of God; c. [[כַּעַשְׂ ְעִמָּדִי]] Job 10:17 thine anger with me.
